title: Look At Your Loose Selves Having A Fkn Blast At Listen Out Fest In Sydney
text:
Listen Out Festival fest is known for bringing the biggest of line-ups to Australia and this year was no exception.

The 2019 bill included the likes of Flume, Denzel Curry, Diplo, 6lack, ScHoolboy Q and more.

Sydney was the last stop of the Listen Out Festival tour and hoo-boy was it a loose one. Leikeli47 brought half the crowd onto the stage during her set. JPEGMAFIA ran amock, dialling up the energy so high that no one could keep up. Slowthai brought out pals Peggy and Denzel. Triple One bounced from stage to mosh pit like it was no biggie.

And ya boy Flume performed his new ~conceptual~ set with friends Vera Blue, Reo Cragun and Peggy, where he potted plants, spray-painted signs and smashed shit. It was wild.

If you’re still battling FOMO/want to relive it all again, check out the pics for yourselves.
description: Listen Out Festival has come and gone for another year, and PEDESTRIAN.TV took a bunch of cheeky snaps of you lot having a fkn blast in Sydney.
